channel.title: Sendquest whit more then 2 options
channel.description: U know those Npc wannetalk sendquest well i need 1 whit more then 2 options i know its in there because its used in rs2 to kill delrith in demon slayer questanybody know the sendquest number of something simmelar ?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 06, 2007, 04:08:43 PM[/size][hr]i was suspecting to getno anser,this is a question for more advanced coders

item.title: Sendquest whit more then 2 options
item.dc:creator: @analrape analrape
item.description:
@analrape wrote:

Ugh Read the question dude look at the code!

2 options a yes and a no

i need a sendquest whit more then 2 options,for example 3,4,5

so u could anser yes,maybe,noâ€¦

Read full topic

item.title: Sendquest whit more then 2 options
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

EXAMPLE

case 14600: // Make over mage chat sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4902); sendFrame126("", 4903); sendFrame126("Yo you want a make over?", 4904); sendFrame126("", 4905); sendFrame126("", 4906); sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4901); sendFrame164(4900); NpcDialogueSend = true; break; case 14601: // Make over mage chat option - choose make over y/n sendFrame171(1, 2465); sendFrame171(0, 2468); sendFrame126("Select an Option", 2460); sendFrame126("Sure", 2461); sendFrame126("Nope", 2462); sendFrame164(2459); NpcDialogueSend = true; break; case 14602: // Make over mage chat accept offer sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4902); sendFrame126("", 4903); sendFrame126("Ok that'll be 10000 coins", 4904); sendFrame126("", 4905); sendFrame126("", 4906); sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4901); sendFrame164(4900); NpcDialogueSend = true; break; case 14603: // Make over mage chat option - pay coins sendFrame171(1, 2465); sendFrame171(0, 2468); sendFrame126("Select an Option", 2460); sendFrame126("Ok", 2461); sendFrame126("Gay...", 2462); sendFrame164(2459); NpcDialogueSend = true; break; case 14604: // Make over mage chat accept coins if(playerHasItemAmount(995, 10000)) { deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 10000); showInterface(3559); NpcDialogue = 0; break; } else { sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4902); sendFrame126("", 4903); sendFrame126("You got no money, bitch,", 4904); sendFrame126("come back when you got some.", 4905); sendFrame126("", 4906); sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4901); sendFrame164(4900); NpcDialogueSend = true; break; }

just add a frame & a case

Read full topic
